      • signText

        public final ITextComponent[] signText

      • lineBeingEdited

        public int lineBeingEdited
        The index of the line currently being edited. Only used on client side, but defined on both. Note this is only really used when the > < are going to be visible.

      • getUpdatePacket

        @Nullable
public SPacketUpdateTileEntity getUpdatePacket()
        Retrieves packet to send to the client whenever this Tile Entity is resynced via World.notifyBlockUpdate. For modded TE's, this packet comes back to you clientside in TileEntity.onDataPacket(net.minecraft.network.NetworkManager, net.minecraft.network.play.server.SPacketUpdateTileEntity)
        覆盖:
        getUpdatePacket 在类中 TileEntity

      • getUpdateTag

        public NBTTagCompound getUpdateTag()
        Get an NBT compound to sync to the client with SPacketChunkData, used for initial loading of the chunk or when many blocks change at once. This compound comes back to you clientside in TileEntity.handleUpdateTag(net.minecraft.nbt.NBTTagCompound)
        覆盖:
        getUpdateTag 在类中 TileEntity
